DellSecureBoot.description: This resource contains the Dell specific Redfish implementation for SecureBoot.
DellSecureBoot.longDescription: This resource contains the Dell specific Redfish implementation for SecureBoot.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Certificates.description: A reference to the collection of SecureBoot Certificates associated with this system.
Certificates.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a collection of type SecureBoot Certificates.

FirmwareImageHashes.description: A reference to the collection of FirmwareImageHash associated with this system.
FirmwareImageHashes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a collection of FirmwareImageHash.

title: #DellSecureBoot.v1_1_0
